arabicText: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	when	she	came,	it	was	said	to	her,	“Is	your	throne	like	this?	She	said,	“As	if	this	is	it!	And	we	
came	to	know	about	this	incident	beforehand	and	submit	(to	you).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	woh	āayi	us	se	kahā	gaya	kya	tera	takht	aisa	hi	hai	boli	goya	yeh	wohi	hai	aur	hum	ko	is	
wāqia	se	pehle	khabar	mil	chuki	aur	hum	farmān	bardār	huwe

arabicText: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍۢ كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	thing	she	used	to	worship	instead	of	Allah	prevented	her;	she	was	indeed	from	the	
disbelieving	people.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	usey	roka	us	cheez	ne	jise	woh	Allah	ke	siwa	poojti	thi	be-shak	woh	kāfir	logoñ	meiñ	se	thi.

arabicText: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةًۭ وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌۭ مُّمَرَّدٌۭ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	was	said	to	her,	“Enter	the	hall”;	and	when	she	saw	it	she	thought	it	was	a	pool	and	bared	her	
shins	*;	said	Sulaiman,	“This	is	only	a	smooth	hall,	affixed	with	glass”;	she	said,	“My	Lord,	I	have	
indeed	wronged	myself,	and	I	now	submit	myself	along	with	Sulaiman	to	Allah,	the	Lord	Of	The	
Creation.”	(*	In	order	to	cross	it)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	se	kaha	gaya	sahen	meiñ	āa	phir	jab	us	ne	usey	dekha	usey	gahrā	pāni	samjhi	aur	apni	sāqeiñ 
(Pindiliyāñ)	kholiñ	Sulaimān	ne	farmaya	yeh	to	ek	chikna	sahen	hai	sheeshoñ	jadā	aurat	ne	arz	
ki	aey	mere	Rab	main	ne	apni	jān	par	zulm	kiya	aur	ab	Sulaimān	ke	sāth	Allah	ke	huzoor	gardan	
rakhti	hooñ	jo	Rab	sāre	jahān	ka.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	sent	to	the	Thamud,	their	
fellowman	Saleh	that,	“Worship	Allah”,	
thereupon	they	became	two	parties	
quarrelling.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	hum	ne	Samood	ki	taraf	unke	
hum	qaum	Sāleh	ko	bheja	ke	Allah	ko	poojo	
to	jabhi	woh	do	giroh	ho	gaye	jhagda	karte.

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“O	my	people,	why	do	you	hasten	
upon	the	evil	before	the	good?	Why	do	you	
not	seek	forgiveness	from	Allah?	Perhaps	
there	may	be	mercy	upon	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sāleh	ne	farmaya	aey	meri	qaum	kyuñ	
burāi	ki	jaldi	karte	ho	bhalāi	se	pehle	Allah	
se	bakhshish	kyun	nahi	māñgte	shayad	
tum	par	Rahem	ho.

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تُفْتَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“We	consider	you	an	evil	omen,	
and	your	companions”;	he	said,	“Your	evil	
omen	is	with	Allah	-	in	fact	you	people	have	
fallen	into	trial.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	hum	ne	bura	shugoon	liya	tum	se	aur	
tumhāre	sāthiyoñ	se	farmaya	tumhāri	bad	
shagooni	Allah	ke	pās	hai	balke	tum	log	
fitne	meiñ	pade	ho.

arabicText: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍۢ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	there	were	nine	persons	in	the	city	
who	used	to	cause	turmoil	in	the	land	and	
did	not	wish	reform.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	shaher	meiñ	nau	shakhs	they	ke	
zameen	meiñ	fasād	karte	aur	sawār	na	
chāhte.

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Swearing	by	Allah	they	said	to	one	
another,	“We	will	indeed	attack	him	and	
his	family	at	night,	and	then	say	to	his	heir,	
‘We	were	not	present	at	the	time	of	slaying	
of	this	household,	and	indeed	we	are	
truthful.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āpas	meiñ	Allah	ki	qasameiñ	khākar	bole	
hum	zaroor	rāt	ko	chāpa	māreñge	ge	Sāleh	
aur	uske	ghar	wāloñ	par	phir	uske	wāris	se	
kaheñge	us	ghar	wāloñ	ke	qatl	ke	waqt	
hum	hāzir	na	they	aur	be-shak	hum	
sachche	haiñ.

arabicText: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًۭا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	they	devised	a	scheme,	and	We	made	
our	secret	plan,	and	they	remained	
neglectful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unhoñ	ne	apna	sa	makr	kiya	aur	hum	
ne	apni	khufya	tadbeer	farmayi	aur	woh	
ghāfil	rahe.

arabicText: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	see	what	was	the	result	of	their	
scheming	-	We	destroyed	them	and	their	entire	nation.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	dekho	kaisa	anjām	huwa	unke	makr	ka	hum	ne	halāk	kar	diya	unheiñ	aur	unki	sāri	qaum	ko.

arabicText: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	these	are	their	houses	fallen	flat,	the	recompense	of	their	injustice;	indeed	in	this	is	a	sign	for	
people	who	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	yeh	haiñ	unke	ghar	dhaye	pade	badla	unke	zulm	ka	be-shak	is	meiñ	nishāni	hai	jānne	wāloñ	
ke	liye.

englishTranslationText: And	We	rescued	those	who	accepted	faith	and	used	to	fear.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	hum	ne	unko	bacha	liya	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	darte	they.

arabicText: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(remember)	Lut	when	he	said	to	his	people,	“What!	You	stoop	to	the	shameful	whereas	you	
can	see?”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Lūt	ko	jab	us	ne	apni	Qaum	se	kahā	kya	be-hayāi	par	āate	ho	aur	tum	soojh	rahe	ho.

arabicText: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تَجْهَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: “What!	You	lustfully	go	towards	men,	leaving	the	women?!	In	fact,	you	are	an	ignorant	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	tum	mardoñ	ke	pās	masti	se	jāte	ho	aurteiñ	chord	kar	balke	tum	jāhil	log	ho.
